description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Bertram Family. By the author of “Chronicles of the Schönberg-Cotta Family” [i.e. Elizabeth Charles], etc" Contributor: CHARLES, Elizabeth. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12638.k.6." Page: 303 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1876 Publisher: Daldy, Isbister & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000300697 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
